attributes.action: Do not stop trans women being treated in women's NHS hospital wards
attributes.additional_details: Support all citizens to live freely as who they are, do not unfairly target trans people for political gain and with no evidence to support proposed changes
attributes.background: Stop the suggested move to stop trans women being treated in women's NHS hospital wards

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/647146
